subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Eddy Curry now knows he can score 20 points nearly at will and carry the Knicks for weeks at a time. But his evolution cannot be complete until he has faced the ultimate big-man test: Shaquille O’Neal.
snippet: Eddy Curry now knows he can score 20 points nearly at will and carry the Knicks for weeks at a time. But his evolution cannot be complete until he has faced the ultimate big-man test: Shaquille O’Neal.
